author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Following the recent Rust for Linux drama I had expected Hector Martin to at least take a bit of a break but it seems as if it's going a bit further than that and he's going to actually leave the project.

title: Asahi Linux Founder Leaves The Project
